author: Special Correspondent
text:
Slamming AIMIM leader Asaduddin Owaisi for his refusal to chant ‘Bharat Mata ki Jai’, the Shiv Sena on Thursday called for revoking the citizenship and voting rights of those who refuse to chant the slogan, and supported the suspension of Majlis MLA Waris Pathan from the Maharashtra Assembly.

“Hardik Patel has been arrested for unintentional disrespect to the national tricolour and is still in jail on charges of sedition. Hasn’t Asaduddin Owaisi committed treason by insulting Mother India?” asked an editorial in Sena mouthpiece Saamna .

The editorial questioned why Mr. Owaisi had gone unpunished in a state ruled by the BJP. “There is BJP government in Maharashtra, and yet Mr Owaisi managed to escape from Latur after insulting Mother India. The Chief Minister will have to answer for this.”
title: Revoke citizenship of those who don't chant, says Sena
